Glendale.Chinese massacre of 1871: The Chinese massacre of 1871 was a race riot that occurred on October 24, 1871, in Los Angeles, California, when a mob of around 500 white and mestizo persons entered Chinatown and attacked, robbed, and murdered Chinese residents. The massacre took place on Calle de los Negros (Street of the Negroes), also referred to as "Nigger Alley". The mob gathered after hearing that a policeman had been shot and a rancher killed by Chinese.
